eEak Qmvg nyTIa SRXVc vzLa jgBfc WXDas CiUCW kqbG zrdEG txGfn ygKVe BbezD UOtxr CVfpq xijV soGRS XgdC sEIlf daWqJ ">Man shot to death inside moving vehicle in West Town, police say</span></h1></p><div class="QHblV nkdHX mHUQ kvZxL hTosT whbOj " data-testid="prism-byline"><div class="VZTD mLASH BQWr OcxMG oJce "><div class="kKfXc ubAkB VZTD rEPuv "><div class="VZTD mLASH gpiba "><p class="jTKbV zIIsP ZdbeE xAPpq QtiLO JQYD ">Wednesday, February 4, 2026 2:12AM</p></div></div></div></div><p class="XQpSH " data-testid="prism-divider"></p><div class="xvlfx ZRifP TKoO eaKKC EcdEg bOdfO qXhdi NFNeu UyHES " data-testid="prism-article-body"><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao MvWXB TjIXL aGjvy ebVHC "><span class="oyrPY qlwaB AGxeB  ">CHICAGO -- </span>A man was shot to death inside a moving vehicle on the city's West Side on Tuesday afternoon, Chicago police said.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Police said the shooting happened in the West Town neighborhood's 700-block of North Wolcott Avenue just before 4:45 p.m.</p><p class="shortcode-centertext EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy "></p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">A 32-year-old man was shot by an unknown person, police said.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">The victim, shot in the torso, was taken to Stroger Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Area Three detectives are investigating.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC TjIXL aGjvy ">Further information was not immediately available.</p><p class="EkqkG IGXmU nlgHS yuUao lqtkC eTIW sUzSN "><strong class="vtkaO ">INTERACTIVE SAFETY TRACKER  <a class="zZygg UbGlr neighborhood</a> </strong></p></div><p class="uvrxY zOGtW "></p><p></p></div></div></div></body></html>
